Module UsefulSchoolPortal

Package graphics

package graphics
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    AdminAddClassesPanel
    The AdminAddClassesPanel class contains the graphics necessary to add classes in school system.
    AdminAddUsersPanel
    The AdminAddUsersPanel class contains the graphics necessary to add users to a school system.
    AdminDeleteClassesPanel
    The AdminDeleteClassesPanel class contains the graphics necessary to delete classes from the school system.
    AdminDeleteUsersPanel
    The AdminDeleteUsersPanel class contains the graphics necessary to delete users from a school system.
    AdminEditProfilePanel
    The AdminEditProfilePanel class contains the graphics necessary to edit their own profile in the school system.
    AdminHomepagePanel
    The AdminHomepagePanel class contains the graphics necessary to establish a hub for administrators upon login.
    AdminManageClassesPanel
    The AdminManageClassesPanel class contains the graphics necessary to manage classes in a school system.
    AdminManageSchedulePanel
    The AdminManageSchedulePanel class contains the graphics necessary to manage the schedule of the school system.
    AdminManageUsersPanel
    The AdminManageUsersPanel class contains the graphics necessary to edit the profile of a separate user in the school system.
    AdminStudentInfractionsPanel
    The AdminStudentInfractionsPanel class contains the graphics necessary to add infractions on a student's record.
    Frame
    The Frame class is the class that creates all the panels and serves as the backbone of the graphics structure for this program.
    GraphicsConstants
    The GraphicsConstants class contains values useful throughout the creation of graphics during the program.
    GraphicsHelpers
    The GraphicsHelpers class contains methods useful for the graphics classes as they process through data before sending it to DataManagement or complete repetitive tasks.
    IntroductionPanel
    The IntroductionPanel class contains the graphics necessary to create the introductory panel that greets users when opening the program.
    LoginPanel
    The LoginPanel class contains the graphics necessary to log a user into the school system.
    RegisterPanel
    The RegisterPanel class contains the graphics necessary to register a school system into the program.
    StudentClassHomepagePanel
    The StudentClassHomepagePanel class contains the graphics necessary to view a class homepage.
    StudentEditProfilePanel
    The StudentEditProfilePanel class contains the graphics necessary to edit their own profile in the school system.
    StudentGradingSimulatorPanel
    The StudentGradingSimulatorPanel contains the graphics necessary to see what grade they need to earn on their final to achieve a particular grade or the grade they are projected to achieve.
    StudentHomepagePanel
    The StudentHomepagePanel class contains the graphics necessary to establish a hub for students upon login.
    StudentViewGradesPanel
    The StudentViewGradesPanel class contains the graphics necessary to view grades for each class the student is in.
    StudentViewInfractionsPanel
    The StudentViewInfractionsPanel class contains the graphics necessary to view infractions for each student.
    StudentViewRostersPanel
    The StudentViewRostersPanel class contains the graphics necessary to view the rosters for each class the student is in.
    TeacherClassHomepagePanel
    The TeacherClassHomepagePanel class contains the graphics necessary to view a class homepage.
    TeacherEditClassHomepagePanel
    The TeacherEditClassHomepagePanel class contains the graphics necessary to edit a class homepage.
    TeacherEditProfilePanel
    The TeacherEditProfilePanel class contains the graphics necessary to edit their own profile in the school system.
    TeacherGradeAssignmentsPanel
    The TeacherGradeAssignmentsPanel class contains the graphics necessary to properly grade assignments for each class a teacher is in.
    TeacherHomepagePanel
    The TeacherHomepagePanel class contains the graphics necessary to establish a hub for teachers upon login.
    TeacherInfractStudentsPanel
    The TeacherInfractStudentsPanel class contains the graphics necessary to add infractions on a student's record.
    TeacherManageAssignmentsPanel
    The TeacherManageAssignmentsPanel class contains the graphics necessary to add, modify, or delete an assignment in any class a teacher is in.
    TeacherManageClassesPanel
    The TeacherManageClassesPanel class contains the graphics necessary to change the grading methods for assignments.
    TeacherViewRostersPanel
    The TeacherViewRostersPanel class contains the graphcis necessary to view the rosters for each class the teacher is in.
    TermsAndConditionsPanel
    The TermsAndConditionsPanel class contains the graphics necessary to have a terms and conditions page.
